sorular.soru: Which sign indicates a one-way street?

feedback.metin: Sign C-3 indicates a one-way street, where entry from this side is allowed. Sign D-1 indicates a compulsory direction of travel and is used on roundabouts. Sign D-4 indicates a compulsory direction of travel at the intersection you are approaching. This sign does not say anything about whether or not to expect drivers from the opposite direction.

sorular.soru: In what situation should you give way to the other road user?

feedback.metin: Only in the lower right situation do you not have to give way to the other road user. In the upper left situation, the cyclist keeps following the roundabout you want to turn off from. Through traffic on the same road goes before traffic turning off. You must give way to the cyclist. In the upper right situation, you are approaching priority triangles and sign B-6. This means that you should give way to drivers on the intersecting road. You must give way to the blue car. In the lower left situations, you are turning off from the same road the cyclist keeps following. You must give way to the cyclist. In the lower right situation, the moped rider is approaching priority triangles and must give way to drivers on the intersecting road. You do not have to give way to the moped rider.

sorular.soru: You stop to make a phone call. In which situation is that allowed?

feedback.metin: Stopping to make a phone call does not fall under standing still, but under parking. This is not allowed within five metres of a pedestrian crossing, as in the upper left situation. Nor is this allowed next to a solid yellow line as in the bottom left situation. It is allowed in a parking space or on a suggestion lane as in both situations on the right.

sorular.soru: In which situation are you allowed to park on the left side of the carriageway?

feedback.metin: In a one-way street, there is no prohibition on parking on the left side of the carriageway. In that case, you can simply park on the left side. Parking is prohibited on both sides of the carriageway in a no-parking zone. If there is a separate E-1 sign (no parking) without 'zone', then parking is allowed on the left side.

sorular.soru: Which dashboard light indicates you have the full-beam headlights on?

feedback.metin: The left light indicates that the front fog light is switched on. The middle light indicates that the rear fog light is switched on, and the right light indicates that the full-beam headlights are switched on.

sorular.soru: Which sign indicates a closed lane?

feedback.metin: Sign C indicates a closed lane. You are not allowed to use the lane underneath this sign. Sign A indicates an advance notice of a red cross. The lane is not closed yet, but will be further on. The sign indicates that you should start clearing the lane underneath. Sign B indicates that the lane underneath may be used without further restrictions and sign D indicates that all previous prohibitions on electronic matrix signs have been lifted.
